    • Method Detail

      • getAsymTrustStorePath

        protected java.lang.String getAsymTrustStorePath()
                                          throws InternalErrorException
        Returns the path of directory where trusted public key files are stored.
        Specified by:
        getAsymTrustStorePath in class DefaultFileKeyManager
        Returns:
        the path to the directory where trusted public key store files are stored. Or null if not configured.
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - if internal error occurred retrieving the trust store path.

      • getKeyStorePath

        protected java.lang.String getKeyStorePath()
                                    throws InternalErrorException
        Returns the path of directory where key files are stored.
        Specified by:
        getKeyStorePath in class FileKeyManager
        Returns:
        the path to the directory where key store files are stored. Or null if not configured.
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - if internal error occurred retrieving the key store path.

      • getProtectPassphrase

        protected java.lang.String getProtectPassphrase()
                                         throws InternalErrorException
        Method to retrieve the configured pass phrase used to protect generated keys.
        Specified by:
        getProtectPassphrase in class FileKeyManager
        Returns:
        the configured protect pass phrase or null if no passphrase is configured.
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - if internal error occurred retrieving configuration.
